scripts.test:forvalidtags: npm run generate:a11ytestpaths && npx site-validator --path testPaths.txt --verbose --local --cache 0
scripts.test:fora11ycompliance: npm run generate:a11ytestpaths && npx run pa11y-ci
scripts.test:a11y: npm run generate:a11ytestpaths && npx site-validator --path testPaths.txt --verbose --local --cache 0 && npx run pa11y-ci
